summary: Filmic insert to Eisenstein's modernized, free adaptation of Ostrovskiy's 19th-century Russian stage play, "The Wise Man" ("Na vsyakogo mudretsa dovolno prostoty"). The anti-hero Glumov ... See full summary »
cast: Grigoriy Aleksandrov|Aleksandr Antonov|Sergei M. Eisenstein|Mikhail Gomorov|Junior Inkizhinov|Vera Muzykant|Ivan Pyrev|Maksim Shtraukh|Vera Yanukova|Ivan Yazykanov
title: El diario de Glúmov
